attributes.action: reconsider the rejected plans of Sheffield City Council to prevent the closure of Wisewood School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sheffield City Council put forward two options to schools minister Jim Knight - one seeking the extra £25 million needed to rebuild Myers school and refurbish Wisewood school.

But when that was rejected a second scheme was submitted.

That would have taken the £25 million from the council's own coffers, on the basis that future plans for rebuilding secondaries across the city as part of the Building Schools for the Future programme.

see http://www.thestar.co.uk/news/Bid-fails-to-stop-schools.4287677.jp
